How to get more clicks on your Bitly links
Not all Bitly links are created equal.
Tell us‚Äîwhich would you be more likely to click on:
bit.ly/40pQsBv or bit.ly/MyBrandLink?
The second one uses a Custom Back-Half. You can customize your link in this way up to 5 times a month with your free account. And you can do it right while you're creating the link, or edit the link later.
Try it out
How to get even more clicks on your Bitly links
Want to maximize your results? Go from bit.ly/MyBrandLinkto yourbrnd.co/link.
This is an example of a Custom Domain, where you swap out bit.ly for a short URL of your choosing. Here's what you need to know:
Custom domains are proven to get more clicks than generic Bitly links.
The back-halves are all yours, and can be as short as 1 character.
Setting up a custom domain takes under 5 minutes‚Äîno IT ticket required!
